replies.replyComment: @K SA What a jock dear, this guy doesn't accept Buddhist Thripitaka as real. he calls it as a collection of truth and myths. so how can he make haven for Buddhist teaching he by him self was deleted some of Buddhist teaching as myths some of Buddhist teaching to be amended . This may be a place for kind of preaching but those preachings are accordance with real theravada teachings. That is because he himself dictated that he attained to enlightenment not because of Buddhist teaching (Thripitaka) but a way which was invented by him self

Kasun Jayasiri what about thousands of priests in SL not doing anything for the Buddha sasanaya and just shouting on the streets, attending classes/campuses and learning everything over than spiritually oriented subjects with gihi people  and/or even doing politics?  Are those activities superior to this? Don‚Äôt think so. This priest has made a haven for anyone who wants to come and do meditation, eat a meal or just relax here. There is a fast growing population of Buddhists who really practice what the Buddha taught is living in the Western Hemisphere. They will visit Umanda like places and help to preserve this great teaching. Will they care about priests who are into politics? Don‚Äôt think so.
Obawahanseta meveni viswakarma wada kirimata sakthiya lebewa saadu saadu saadu ...

replies.replyComment: SL Krishan Bro pavadi ayatath nivan maga vasenne ne. Sitha thamai hama detama mula. Vanavasi bhikshu e kalayeth thamange devel kadunama ewa aluth wadiya kala. Bata hira ratawala silwath bhikshu vahana padawanawa. Ewa naraka wada nowei. E aya gihiyanta udav karanawa me wagema hoda hithin.

SL Krishan Bro athaharinna kiuwe niganntayan,  buddha dahama nowei. Maligawaka jeewath Wunath badim adu Namali buddahama ava boda wunu kenek.  Paw saha pin Hindu darshanaye deval. Buds dahama thibenne keles pamanai, Pinkam karalath keles hadagannawa - ‚Äúseelabatha paramasa‚Äù kiyanne ewata.  Sovan Venna puluwani badeem thiyagena - buddha charithaya gihi aya kopamana sothapanna vunada? Hithala balanna.

comments.comment: Buddematunta ugatunta vetarak newai dugi deppatuntath dora arenda mewa dakkahama e gollath hitalawane ape rate hamuduruwan wahansela meccara lassanata teyan inne mehema karanne kohomada kiyala hetanawa asa hitanawa eyalath haki pamanen paduru danawa ane waryenma  duppata th haki taramen danaya denawa

comments.comment: Dakkama hithatath mara sanipayak danenawa .awagema  harima lassanata awa hadala waga karala thiyenne abawahanseta sakthiya dahiriya labewa thawath lassana nirmana karanna Budusaranai

@dhamma vilasa samantha badra mehema village ekak hadapu ekata newei baninne. Eka honda wadak. Ohuge dakshathawaya. Namuth niyama bududahama wikurthi karala, vinaya wenas karala, thamange shastrun wahanseta apahasa karala mokadda yanna hadana niwana. Ohu thamane dahamak deshanaya karanne. Duka kiyanne godak bauddayonta eka penen nathi eka. Harindrath athuluwa.
dhamma vilasa ane pala yako yanna.thoge mole thalei balagena wadiwenakota.

Zed Zero yanthan mole thiyana ekek hambuna gon rala athara.mu agama vikunagena kana cheewaradhariyek machan.ape agama nathikarana mithya dhushtikayo thama ovata salli denne.nirwanaya sarala karala pennala ekata short cut pennana eka thamai mu karanne .mewata saadu kiyana ape bath kana harak sahenna innawa ithin.thuuu
